tool.name: CVS
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the CVS source code management system.

cvar.name: CVSCOFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options that are passed to the CVS checkout subcommand.

cvar.name: CVSCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to fetch source files from a CVS repository.

cvar.name: CVSCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when fetching a source file from a CVS repository. If this is not set, then &cv-link-CVSCOM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: CVSFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options that are passed to CVS. By default, this is set to -d $CVSREPOSITORY to specify from where the files must be fetched.

cvar.name: CVSREPOSITORY
cvar.summary: The path to the CVS repository. This is referenced in the default &cv-link-CVSFLAGS; value.
